name: Gridrunner (2004)
description:
A remake of Jeff Minter's classic, Gridrunner, that I wrote in 2004 using Blitz Basic.

Runs fine under Windows 10 but may ask to download DirectInput.

Can't take credit for the excellent music. Just a mod file I found at the time. Would love to credit whoever wrote it.

F1 on the title screen gives instructions and controls.
